entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Recently while developing Unity Plugins I decided to upgrade my documentation from simplistic PDFs to proper websites with API documentation generated from my code comments. After looking around a bit I found an awesome tool called Wyam which makes the whole process very easy:

  1. Build it with Wyam.
  2. Upload it to GitHub to host.

That's it. All for free.

Previously, I was using my empty Google+ page as my Unity Asset Store publisher website, but now that Google+ is about to be killed off it's time to make a proper portfolio, so I've built this blog with Wyam too.

I'm currently working on a large update to my Animancer plugin. Any feedback or suggestions for how I could improve things would be much appreciated. Just email me at KybernetikGames@gmail.com.
